channel.title: Need help with my itemonitem.java file, please contribute!

item.title: Need help with my itemonitem.java file, please contribute!
item.dc:creator: @1_vitiello_1 1 vitiello 1
item.description:
@1_vitiello_1 wrote:

hey guys, i got 4 errors in my itemonitem.java file, i was wondering if you guys can help with it!

Errors:

itemtoitem.java:1: class, interface, or enum expected public classItemOnItem { ^ itemtoitem.java:3: class, interface, or enum expected public void itemonitem(int ID,int useWith,int itemUsed) { ^ itemtoitem.java:6: class, interface, or enum expected if(itemUsed == 1 && useWith == 2 || itemUsed == 2 && useWith == 1) { // item1+it em2 ^ itemtoitem.java:8: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Itemtoitem,java:

[code]public classItemOnItem {

public void itemonitem(int ID,int useWith,int itemUsed) {
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];

if(itemUsed == 1 && useWith == 2 || itemUsed == 2 && useWith == 1) { // item1+item2
c.showInterface(2311);
}

}
}[/code]

Please help!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my itemonitem.java file, please contribute!
